summary: Meeting by chance when they return to their tiny California hometown, two former high-school sweethearts reflect on their shared past.
cast: Mark Duplass|Sarah Paulson|Clu Gulager|James Andrews|Harris Benbury|Daniel Brooks|Mary Brooks|Bill Greer|Cindy Greer|Ana Iovine|Leo Munoz|Loretta Munoz|Brady Rice|Karen Rice
title: Blue Jay
